Daemon Writing Assistant
1. Please enter and submit the GPT API key in the designated box to the left.

2. Enter your text in the textbox above.

3. Choose from the following buttons on the left:
  • GrammarRover: Provides grammar suggestions based on your input text.
  • Synthesizer: Generates an introduction and conclusion based on your input text.
  • Elaborator: Offers suggestions on how to elaborate or expand your input text further.
